thag3.11:5.2: who has left their home out of faith,
thag3.11:5.4: who are tireless and pure of livelihood.
thag3.11:6.2: who has left their home out of faith,
thag3.11:6.3: a mendicant staying in the Saṅgha,
thag3.11:6.4: being wise, would train in monastic discipline.
thag3.11:7.2: who has left their home out of faith,
thag3.11:7.3: skilled in what is appropriate and what is not,
